text: Virginia Bosler (September 23, 1926 - August 30, 2020) was an American actress and dancer. She was born in Newton, Massachusetts. She was known for being an original cast member for the Broadway classics Oklahoma! and Brigadoon. Bosler died on August 30, 2020 at the age of 93.Brigadoon Original Cast Member Virginia Bosler Passes Away at 93 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 deaths Category:American stage actors Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:People from Newton, Massachusetts Category:1926 births
title: Virginia Bosler
